title: Alzheimer's disease and related dementia services coordinator
context: [§349-3.2] Alzheimer&rsquo;s disease and related dementia services coordinator. There is established within the executive office on aging an Alzheimer&rsquo;s disease and related dementia services coordinator to coordinate the provision of public and private Alzheimer&rsquo;s disease and related dementia services. The coordinator shall be appointed by the director in accordance with chapters 76 and 89. [L 2013, c 214, §1]
